programme.title: Paranormal: Caught On Camera: Top 100
programme.desc: ...Camera - Top 100. New. A collection of standout videos from season one, showcasing the most chilling and unexplainable paranormal activity footage captured by eyewitnesses. (S1, ep 10)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn: Behind The Deal
programme.desc: The Family Feud: Peek behind the curtain with the Golds as a family feud escalates when Seth disagrees with Les over the business. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Cosmic Impacts: Meteor impacts have created the perfect environment for humankind. Could new evidence reveal that celestial objects have been sent by an alien intelligence? (S15, ep 6)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Close Encounters of the Fifth Kind: Explore whether contact with extraterrestrial life could have occurred. If so, has this happened in the highest levels of the US government? (S15, ep 7)

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Bang, Zoom, Pawn on the Moon!: The team check out an autographed Apollo 10 book, a set of Bob Hope's golf clubs and circus sideshow banners.

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Father Vs Son: Series following life in a huge Detroit pawn shop. Seth and his dad clash when Les's new idea turns dangerous. Ashley embarks on a new in-house business venture too.

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Trouble Inside: Series following life in a huge Detroit pawn shop. One employee shocks the family by turning violent, and Ashley hits the roof when someone tries to sell her dirty knickers.

programme.desc: Henry Cole and Sam Lovegrove experience mixed results at the Stafford Show. (S1, ep 7)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Weird Al: Adam plans to reignite his fading relationship with Dana by taking her to a concert. Barry and Erica worry that Murray may be feeling depressed. (S3 Ep15/24)

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Mother's Day: Claire and Gloria want to spend Mother's Day hiking with the kids, but their bickering and complaining drive Claire mad, and she brings Gloria down with her. (S2 Ep21)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Grace gets a warning, but can Donny break through to Dillon? Meanwhile, a family reunion continues to grow, but at what cost?

programme.desc: Waverly Hills, 9-0-2-1-D'oh: The family rent a flat in the affluent Waverly Hills area so that Bart and Lisa can get into a good school. (S20 Ep19/21)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Four Great Women and a Manicure: On a visit to the nail salon, Marge and Lisa discuss whether a woman can be simultaneously clever, powerful and beautiful. (S20 Ep20/21)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The First Pitch Insufficiency: Howard's nervous when NASA ask him to throw the first pitch at a baseball game. Sheldon claims his and Amy's relationship is the best in the gang. (S8 Ep3)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Hook-Up Reverberation: Raj's honesty about his past comes back to haunt him when his girlfriend Emily gives Penny the cold shoulder. The guys consider an investment. (S8 Ep4)

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: A Wiener Schnitzel and Underwear in a Tree: The new and final series commences! In the first episode, news of the tornado reaches Sheldon and Mary in Germany. (S7 Ep1)

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: A Roulette Wheel and a Piano Playing Dog: Sheldon realises that he's the weakest student in his class, and Meemaw sets out to expand her gambling business. (S7 Ep2)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Lizard-Spock Expansion: Howard is furious when a woman who he likes falls for Leonard instead, despite Howard's efforts to woo her. (S2 Ep8)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The White Asparagus Triangulation: Sheldon is delighted that Leonard has finally found a girlfriend who matches up to his high standards... Perhaps a little too delighted. (S2 Ep9/23)

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: A Little Snip and Teaching Old Dogs: George Sr is worried Mary wants another baby, so he gets a secret vasectomy. Linkletter and Sturgis ask Sheldon for help. (S7 Ep11)

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: A New Home and a Traditional Texas Torture: George Sr gets an exciting job offer, and Sheldon prepares for his move to California. (S7 Ep12)

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Bixby's Back: To avoid turning into that old boring couple, Phil and Claire decide to revisit their Clive and Juliana role-playing rendezvous from last Valentine's Day. (S2 Ep14)

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Princess Party: The guest list for Lily's princess-themed birthday party gets a little out of hand when Mitchell decides to invite Mum, much to Claire's dismay. (S2 Ep15)

programme.desc: El Viaje Misterioso de Nuestro Jomer (The Mysterious Voyage of Our Homer): Homer eats a dangerous chilli, has a hallucinogenic trip and meets a talking coyote (Johnny Cash). (S8 Ep9/25)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Springfield Files: Homer thinks he's seen an alien in the woods. This could be a case for Mulder and Scully (guest stars David Duchovny and Gillian Anderson). (S8 Ep10/25)

programme.desc: The Electric Can Opener Fluctuation: Leonard's attempts to woo Penny are constantly thwarted. Sheldon heads to Texas after learning his friends meddled with his expedition data. (S3 Ep1)

programme.desc: The Jiminy Conjecture: Leonard and Penny feel awkward around each other after their romantic liaison, while Sheldon and Howard take bets to determine a species of cricket. (S3 Ep2)

programme.desc: Large Marge: Marge accidentally gets breast implants after mistakenly thinking that Homer was flirting with two businesswomen while he was building houses for the homeless. (S14 Ep4/22)

programme.desc: Grace wants answers, and a shocking ultimatum forces someone to make an impossible choice. Meanwhile, a disastrous date leaves one resident seeking help in all the wrong places.

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube Shorts
programme.desc: A short, cheeky clip from Rude Tube's naughty little sister Rude(ish) Tube, featuring sheep.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Davide: In Boston, Gordon Ramsay visits Davide, an Italian restaurant that's been run into the ground by brothers Frank and Anthony. Can they learn to trust each other again? (S4 Ep5/13) [SL]

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Coming to Homerica: When nearby Ogdenville's unemployed come to Springfield looking for jobs, Mayor Quimby shuts the town's borders and enlists private citizens to guard them. (S20 Ep21/21)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: You Only Move Twice: Homer is offered a new job by mysterious businessman Hank Scorpio. But will Marge, Bart and Lisa be happy in their idyllic new home town? (S8 Ep2/25)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Focus Attenuation: The guys attempt to invent something of scientific importance but only come up with new and enjoyable ways to procrastinate. (S8 Ep5)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Expedition Approximation: Sheldon and Raj try to find out if they could survive a dark-matter research expedition in a salt mine by simulating the conditions in a tunnel. (S8 Ep6)

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: A Strudel and a Hot American Boy Toy: Sheldon explores Germany behind Mary's back, Missy attempts to pull a fast one on George Sr, and Meemaw and Dale adjust. (S7 Ep3)

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: Ants on a Log and a Cheating Winker: Missy steps up, Mary has a surprise for George, and Sheldon finds his dorm occupied. (S7 Ep4)

programme.title: Married at First Sight Australia
programme.desc: Brand new series: It's time for the partner swap, as the husbands and wives move in with new partners, but some are blindsided by hidden truths and blunt feedback. (S12 Ep26)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Vartabedian Conundrum: Leonard goes to Penny for help when his relationship with Stephanie takes off faster than he'd like, but will he act on her advice? (S2 Ep10/23)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Bath Item Gift Hypothesis: At Christmas, Leonard's hunky colleague starts dating Penny, while Sheldon's obsession with gift-giving etiquette torments everyone. (S2 Ep11)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Killer Robot Instability: Kripke challenges the boys to a robot duel, while Howard is devastated when Penny finally tells him what she thinks of his chauvinism. (S2 Ep12)

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: Funeral: Young Sheldon ends with a two-episode finale. Sheldon leaves East Texas for the California Institute of Technology, following a family bereavement. (S7 Ep13)

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: Memoir: Jim Parsons and Mayim Bialik reprise their roles as Sheldon Cooper and Amy Farrah Fowler in the last ever episode of Young Sheldon. (S7 Ep14)

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Regrets Only: Phil and Claire have a huge fight but Phil hasn't got a clue what it's about. Gloria and Jay try to help them. (S2 Ep16)

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Two Monkeys and a Panda: While Claire runs herself ragged trying to play peacemaker with Haley and Alex, Phil sneaks off for a nice relaxing day at the spa. (S2 Ep17)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Twisted World of Marge Simpson: Marge opens a pretzel franchise after meeting the Pretzel Man (guest star Jack Lemmon). But Fat Tony wants a slice of the action. (S8 Ep11/25)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Mountain of Madness: An avalanche traps Homer and Mr Burns in a mountain cabin during a team-building exercise. (S8 Ep12/25)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Gothowitz Deviation: Sheldon tries to modify Penny's behaviour, and rewards her with chocolate when she does what he wants, while Howard and Raj go to a goth nightclub. (S3 Ep3)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Pirate Solution: Raj must find a job or he'll be sent back to India, so he accepts an offer of work from Sheldon. Leonard and Penny try to get some time for themselves. (S3 Ep4)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Creepy Candy Coating Corollary: Due to a childhood snub, Sheldon is irked when Star Trek actor Wil Wheaton (guest starring as himself) takes part in the same contest as him. (S3 Ep5)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Helter Skelter: The Simpsons' house must be fumigated after a hockey player gives Lisa his termite-infested stick. The only place they can find to live is in a reality TV show. (S14 Ep5/22)

programme.title: Hollyoaks

programme.desc: We hear about Russell's pranks which (bravely) were usually at the expense of Sir Alex Ferguson. Watch to the end to find out what happened when he aimed a snowball at the boss.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Gary Bailey
programme.desc: The former United keeper dialled in to the Pod all the way from Miami Beach. He told us how he struggled to settle in to the dressing room at times and how it sometimes ended up in a fight.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Raimond
programme.desc: The former United keeper looks back on his time at Old Trafford and reveals the highs and lows of working alongside Peter Schmeichel.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Ji-Sung Park
programme.desc: Ji reflected fondly on his special years at United and his close relationship with the fans, but he requested them to stop singing his chant, which has offensive connotations to the people of Korea.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Luke Chadwick

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Schweinsteiger
programme.desc: Deutscher Fussballmeister spoke glowingly of United's interim manager, Ralf Rangnick, and midfielder Scott McTominay, whose talent stood out to Schweinsteiger when he was training with Reserves.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Stam - Part 1

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Stam - Part 2
programme.desc: Jaap talks us through his controversial exit from Manchester United, and reveals that there was an opportunity for him to return to Old Trafford in the seasons that followed.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Kieran Richardson

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Mikael Silvestre
programme.desc: The former France international looked back on a glittering career at Old Trafford, and picked out some of his highligths from working with both Sir Alex Ferguson and later, Arsene Wenger at Arsenal.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: John Aston Jr
programme.desc: The former United winger reflected on the iconic night at Wembley, where he picked up the Man of the Match Award alongside his winners' medal.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Owen Hargreaves
programme.desc: Owen looked back on his time working with Sir Alex Ferguson, what went through his head before taking a penalty in the 2008 Champions League Final shootout and the details of his career-ending injury.

programme.title: Y Pitws Bychain
programme.desc: Mae'n fore oer yn y ddôl ac mae'r Pitws Bychain am wneud dillad cynnes efo help dafad gyfeillgar. It's a cold morning, and The Wee Littles decide that they should make some warmer clothes.

programme.title: Jambori
programme.desc: Ymunwch a Jam ar daith llawn synau, cerddoriaeth a lluniau - bydd cysgodion yn dawnsio a robotiaid yn chwarae! Join Jam on a musical adventure full of interesting sounds and pictures!

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Yng nghanol prysurdeb y paratoi ar gyfer y Nadolig, mae'r Rheolwr Tew yn rhoi gwaith pwysig iawn i Henri. Henry loses a box when the Fat Controller sends him on a special Christmas mission.

programme.title: Blero'n mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Pam fod awyr Ocido wedi troi mor goch? Gyda chymorth Sim, Sam a Swn mae'r ffrindiau'n mynd ar daith yn y roced i gael yr ateb. Why has the sky in Ocido turned so red? The friends find out...

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Mae Meleri a'r criw yn chwilio am micro-blastigau ar draeth Amroth ac ma criw o ddisgyblion Ysgol Penboyr wrthi'n garddio. Huw joins Nanw and Gwenno on their favourite Menai Strait walk.

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Cyfres animeddedig gyda chaneuon a hwiangerddi traddodiadol a chyfoes. Cân hwyliog yn cyflwyno gwahanol fwydydd yw Y Fasged Siopa. A jolly song which indroduces different sorts of foods!

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Betsan yn mynd ar antur i Fferm Fach i weld sut mae moron yn cael eu tyfu gyda Hywel y ffermwr hud. Betsan goes on an adventure to Fferm Fach to learn more about how carrots are grown.

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Mae'r dreigiau'n gyffrous gan fod Cadi yn mynd â nhw i'r sinema, ond mae'r ffilm wedi mynd ar goll! All Bledd a Cef achub y dydd? The dragons are excited - Cadi is taking them to the cinema!

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Mae hi'n amser gwely, ond mae Deian a Loli'n cael lot gormod o hwyl yn chwarae triciau yn lle. It's bedtime, but Deian and Loli are having way too much fun playing tricks instead.

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Mae Bobl yn darganfod seren unig yn yr awyr, felly mae'r Olobos yn creu Awyryn i fynd â nhw i fyny i'r gofod er mwyn chwarae gyda'r seren unig. New animated series for pre-schoolers.

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae Breian yn enwog drwy'r harbwr am ei frolio. Tybed am beth mae'n brolio heddiw? Breian is known throughout the harbour for his boasting abilities. What is he boasting about today?

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Mae nifer o greaduriaid yn byw yn y pwll cerrig, ac mae gan Seren rwyd i'w gweld yn well! Lots of creatures live in the rockpool, and Seren has a net so she can see them better!

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae Siôn, Sam, Sid a Mama Polenta'n sownd mewn coeden. Beth wnân nhw? Siôn, Sam, Sid and Mama Polenta find themselves stuck up a tree. What to do?

programme.title: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Mae Youssef yn galw Harri i ddweud fod sinc wedi torri yn y Cwtsh Newydd, Rhydaman. Mae Harri'n gneud dipyn o lanast yno! Youssef calls Harri to say that a sink has broken in Cwtsh Newydd!

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Sam Tân a'i ffrindiau yn y pentre'. The adventures of Sam Tân and friends in the village.

programme.title: Sbarc
programme.desc: Thema'r rhaglen hon yw 'Esgyrn'. A science series with Tudur Phillips and his two friends, Sbarc the scientist and Nef the Nature Detective. The theme of this programme is 'Bones'.

programme.title: Oli Wyn
programme.desc: Heddiw, cawn weld sut mae trên ffwnicwlar Aberystwyth yn gweithio. Today we find out how the funicular train in Aberystwyth works.

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Cochyn yn ceisio dal 'cneuen fôr' tra bo Digbi yn dweud nad yw cnau môr yn bodoli. Cochyn is trying to catch a 'sea-nut' but Digbi says sea-nuts don't exist!

programme.title: Ahoi!
programme.desc: A fydd y criw o forladron bach o Ysgol Gwenllian yn llwyddo i helpu Ben Dant a Cadi? Will the Ysgol Gwenllian pirates succeed in helping Ben Dant and Cadi defeat Capten Cnec?

programme.title: Y Pitws Bychain
programme.desc: Mae Lleia'n cael gwers bale, ac mae Mymryn yn ymuno am y tro cyntaf, dan arweiniad Cari Crëyr a'i choesau hir. Bitsy is having her ballet lesson and Itsy joins for the first time.

programme.title: Jambori
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Jam ar daith llawn synau, cerddoriaeth a lluniau - bydd cysgodion yn dawnsio a robotiaid yn chwarae. Join Jam on a musical adventure full of interesting sounds and pictures.

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.title: Blero'n mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Pan fydd Blero'n helpu Rheinallt i bobi mae pethau'n mynd o chwith wrth iddo gael y mesuriadau'n anghywir. A spot of baking with Rheinallt goes awry when Blero gets the quantities wrong!

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Meleri a'r criw yn cyfeiriannu ym Mharc Craig y Nos, ac fe fydd Alys a'i ffrind Mila yn gwersylla. Today, Huw and Elan will be surfing in Caswell Bay.

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Y tro hwn mae "Un a Dwy a Thair" yn gân sy'n ymarfer cyfri i ddeg. This time the song "Un a Dwy a Thair" helps practice counting to ten.

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Hywel y ffermwr hud yn tywys Betsan ar antur i Fferm Fach i ddod o hyd i arlleg fel bod hi'n gallu pobi bara garlleg. Hywel and Betsan seek garlic so that she can bake garlic bread.

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Mae Storm Dewi wedi cyrraedd y dyffryn, ac mae Cadi'n cael galwad yn dweud fod coeden wedi cwympo. Storm Dewi has arrived, and Cadi gets a call saying that a tree has fallen on the tracks!

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Dyw Deian ddim yn deall pam fasa Loli eisiau treulio amser ar ei phen ei hun yn darllen yn lle chwara! Deian doesn't understand why Loli wants to spend time alone reading, and not playing.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.desc: Y tro hwn, cawn weld sut mae Colleen yn rhoi bywyd newydd i hen ffefrynau. New cookery series with Colleen on food nostalgia. Today, Colleen celebrates old favourites with a new twist. [SL]

programme.title: Heno
programme.desc: Byddwn yn dathlu llwyddiant ras enwog y She Ultra ac yn cael sgwrs gyda enillwyr Gwobrau RTS Cymru. We celebrate the success of the She Ultra race and chat with the RTS Cymru Awards winners.

programme.title: Cartrefi Cymru
programme.desc: Cyfres yn edrych ar gartrefi Cymru drwy'r oesoedd. Yn y rhaglen hon, edrychwn ar dai o'r 1980au a'r 1990au. In this programme, we'll be focusing on houses from the 1980's and 1990's.

programme.title: Cefn Gwlad
programme.desc: Cwrddwn ag Osian Morris, Dolgellau, dyn ei filltir sgwar sy' wrth ei fodd yn yr awyr agored. We meet Osian, who's hobbies include traditional stone-walling, beekeeping & playing the banjo.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Y WAL
programme.desc: Yr olaf yn y gyfres, ac mae taith Ffion Dafis o waliau eiconig y byd yn gorffen gyda hanes cwymp Wal Berlin. Last in series, and Ffion Dafis's tour of iconic walls ends with the Berlin Wall.

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Mae Crensh wedi pwdu achos bod ei hesgidiau newydd yn frwnt, felly mae'r Olobobs yn creu dwli er mwyn codi ei chalon. Crunch is in a big grump because her new boots are dirty, poor thing.

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Cai ar antur i Fferm Fach i weld o ble mae'r halen mae'n ei roi ar ei sglods yn dod. Cai goes on an adventure to Fferm Fach to see where the salt that he puts on his chips comes from.

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Ai caws yw'r lleuad? Gall Odo a Dwdl fynd I'r lleuad a dod nol a darn I bawb yn y Gwersyll? Cawn weld. Odo figures out a way to go to the moon and bring a piece back for his friends.

programme.title: Blero'n mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Mae Nimbwl yn rhy bryderus i fynd am ei fathodyn Clwb Cymylau cyntaf. Mae Blero a'i ffrindiau'n ceisio ei helpu gyda'i nerfusrwydd. Nimbwl is too nervous to do his first Cloud Club badge.

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Ma'r efeillaid yn edrych ymlaen i fwyta crempog, ond ma 'na greadur bach arall sydd yn awyddus i fwyta eu brecwast, pry cop o'r enw Prys! A spider called Prys is after the twins' pancakes!

programme.title: Oi! Osgar
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Oscar y fadfall a'i ffrindiau yn yr anialwch chwilboeth. A cartoon following the adventures of Oscar and friends in the arid desert - as they try not to die of boredom!

programme.title: Boom!
programme.desc: Y tro yma, maen nhw'n edrych ar wyddoniaeth saethyddiaeth. This time, they build a catapult and experiment to see how to stop eggs from cracking when Aled drops them from a great height.

programme.title: Prys a'r Pryfed
programme.desc: Mae Lloyd yn clywed bod Berry'n symud i'w le ei hun ac mae Lloyd am osgoi edrych yn anaeddfed o'i gymharu. Lloyd hears that Berry is moving into his own place, and he wants to too!

programme.title: New: Mwy o Stwnsh Sadwrn
programme.desc: Cipolwg yn ôl dros rai o uchafbwyntiau rhaglen dydd Sadwrn. Tune in to relive some of the highlights of Saturday's programme.

programme.title: Ceffylau Cymru
programme.desc: Nia Marshalsay-Thomas sy'n ymweld â'r cynhyrchwyr ceffylau, Ron a Debbie Thomas, yn eu canolfan geffylau ger Llanddarog. A visit to Ron and Debbie Thomas at their equestrian centre.

programme.title: Sgorio
programme.desc: Cyfres llawn cyffro pêl-droed y pyramid Cymreig. Cymru Premier JD highlights: Newtown v Aberystwyth Town in the Bottom Six & Cardiff City v Briton Ferry closes the Adran Genero Premier.

programme.title: New: Heno
programme.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Pobol y Cwm
programme.desc: Mae Tom llawn nerfau pan mae'n mynd draw i'r ysbyty. Mae Kelly yn rhoi ei het busnes ymlaen ar gyfer ei diwrnod cyntaf yn Fflamingo's. Tom's full of nerves when he visits the hospital.

programme.title: Rownd a Rownd
programme.desc: Diwrnod anodd i Lowri a Philip, wrth iddynt wynebu apwyntiad ysbyty a phrofion tyngedfennol. A difficult day for Lowri and Philip, with their hospital appointment and critical tests.

programme.title: New: Ysbyty: Dan Bwysau
programme.desc: Awn i Adran Argyfwng Maelor Wrecsam; cawn olwg onest ar be sy'n achosi eu problemau a sut ma'r ysbyty am ddatrys pethau. We take an unflinching look at Wrexham Maelor's Emergency department.

programme.title: Clwb Rygbi
programme.desc: Uchafbwyntiau o'r rownd ddiweddaraf o Super Rygbi Cymru a hefyd Farsiti Cymru. Highlights from the latest round of Super Rugby Wales and also Varsity Wales. EC available.

programme.title: Iaith ar Daith
programme.desc: Y cyn-chwaraewr rygbi, Josh Navidi, sy'n dysgu Cymraeg tro hwn efo help ei ffrind Ken Owens. Learning Welsh this time, with Ken Owens' help, is former international rugby player Josh Navidi.

programme.title: Y Tralalas
programme.desc: Mae Harmoni, Melodi a Bop yn mynd ar wyliau, hwrê! Maen nhw'n cael gymaint o hwyl fel bod nhw'n methu cofio sut ddaethon nhw yna - o na! The Tralalas are going on holiday, hooray!

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Mae Ben Dant ar antur newydd i ailgylchu - i droi sbwriel yn sbeshal a gwastraff yn gampwaith. Ben Dant joins the pupils of Ysgol Dyffryn Trannon, Trefeglwys to create a superb treasure.

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Mae'n rhaid i Twrchyn a'r cwn achub Arawn y Ci Arwrol! Arawn the Super Pup comes to Porth yr Haul, in Twrchyn's dream. The pups must rescue their super hero!

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae Crawc yn brolio fod e'n gallu mynd i lan y môr yn ei falwn awyr poeth a dod nôl mewn pryd ar gyfer ei ginio mawreddog. Toad is once again full of boasts but soon gets into trouble!

programme.title: Y Diwrnod Mawr
programme.desc: Ar ei ddiwrnod mawr bydd Daragh yn dilyn yn ol troed ei arwr Hedd Wyn. World War I soldier poet Hedd Wyn is Daragh's hero. What will he learn about the famous poet during his big day?

programme.title: Brethyn a Fflwff
programme.desc: Mae Brethyn yn darganfod cyfyngiadau dychymyg Fflwff pan yn esgus bod ar long. Tweedy discovers the limits of little Fluff's imagination when he tries to pretend they're at sea, on a boat.

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Mae Senora Maria yn agor y caffi heddiw - ond pan mae Twm Twrch yn bwyta gormod o'r tsili poeth, be sy'n digwydd iddo? When Twm Twrch eats too much of the hot chilli, disaster strikes!

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Heddiw, mae Ceris yn holi 'Pam bod cathod yn mynd allan yn y nos?'. Mae ateb Tad-cu'n ddwl ac yn ddoniol. Today, Ceris asks Tad-cu 'Why do cats go out at night?'.

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Diolch i dechnoleg estron, mae Joni'n dysgu bod angen mwy na doniau'n unig ar archarwr. Thanks to alien technology, Joni learns that a superhero needs more than just talent.

programme.title: Kim a Cai a Cranc
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Kim a Cai ar antur hudolus a chwareus llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am gragen newydd i Cranc! Join Kim and Cai as they search for a new shell for Cranc !

programme.title: Blociau Rhif
programme.desc: Hwyl a sbri i blant ifanc gyda'r blociau rhif. Fun and games for young children with the number blocks.

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Mae nith a nai Capten Cwrwgl yn helpu eu hewythr i geisio achub tri walrws bach sydd mewn perygl ar ffloch iâ. Capten Cwrwgl's niece and nephew help save walrus pups on a drifting ice floe.

programme.title: Cywion Bach
programme.desc: Dere ar antur geiriau gyda'r Cywion Bach wrth iddyn nhw fynd am drip i'r acwariwm i ddysgu mwy am air heddiw, 'pysgodyn'. Join Cywion Bach as they go on a trip to the aquarium.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Heddiw mae Pablo wedi mynd i'r traeth! At the beach Pablo refuses to wear suncream so Mum tells him to stay in the shade. Can the animals persuade him to come out and play in the sunshine?

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Cyfres gomedi i blant meithrin sy'n cynnwys sgetsys, eitemau doniol, jôcs a chymeriadau dwl newydd sbon. A comedy show for pre-school children, full of sketches, jokes and fun!

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Mae'n ddiwrnod bath i Bobo a'r Ceffylau Nen ond 'dyw pawb ddim yn or-hoff o'r syniad! It's bathtime for Bobo and the Ceffylau Nen, but not everyone's keen on the idea!

programme.title: Dathlu 'Da Dona
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Hedd yn cael parti môr-ladron gyda Ben Dant. Join Dona Direidi for a fun-filled party, full of games, dancing and singing. Today, Hedd holds a pirate party with Ben Dant.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Heddiw: ymweliad â gwlad sy'n llawn coedwigoedd glaw trofannol a mynyddoedd hudol: Periw. Peru: We learn about the history of the Incas, about 'Machu Picchu' & an animal called a Vicuna.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae Huwcyn wedi adeiladu drysfa tylwyth teg rhyfeddol! When his friends get lost in the maze, will Huwcyn be able to guide them out again?

programme.title: Ne-wff-ion
programme.desc: Heddiw ar Newffion Alaw gydag adroddiad ar agoriad swyddogol gardd synhwyrau Ysgol Llanilar. Today on Newffion Alaw reports on the official opening of Ysgol Llanilar's sensory garden.

programme.title: Y Tralalas
programme.desc: Mae Harmoni, Melodi a Bop yn mynd i'r ardd i gael hwyl yn yr haul! Maen nhw'n cwrdd ag anifeiliaid yr ardd hefyd. Harmony, Melody and Bop go to the garden to have fun in the sun!

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Mae Ben Dant ar antur newydd i ailgylchu, a throi sbwriel yn sbeshal, a gwastraff yn gampwaith. Ben Dant joins the pupils of Ysgol Gynradd Gymraeg Lon Las, Swansea, to create a treasure.

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Mae'n rhaid i'r Pawenlu weithio fel tîm i orchfygu Maer Campus a'i gathod bach. The Paw Patrol must work as a team to overcome some dirty tricks by Mayor Campus and pull out a victory!

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae nifer o drigolion glannau'r afon â'u llygaid ar ellyg aeddfed Crawc. Mae Gwich yn cynnig gwarchod y goeden gellyg... Ratty offers to guard Toad's pear tree - but it disappears!

programme.title: Y Diwrnod Mawr
programme.desc: A fydd gan Dewi'r hyder i berfformio fel cerflun byw ar ei ddiwrnod mawr yng Ngwyl Nol a Mlan? Dewi's plan is to raise money for the local festival by performing as a robot living statue!

programme.title: Brethyn a Fflwff
programme.desc: Mae gan Fflwff reddf am guddio ac yn mwynhau dilyn Brethyn o gwmpas heb iddo sylwi! Fluff has an instinct for hiding and gets a big kick out of following Tweedy without him noticing!

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Twm Twrch heddiw? What's happening in Twm Twrch's world today?

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Heddiw, mae Meg yn gofyn 'Pam bod cymylau gyda ni?' Mae Tad-cu'n ateb efo stori am ei Ddad-cu e, oedd yn hedfan cymylau'r byd i achub anifeiliaid! Today, Meg asks 'What are clouds for?'

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Mae Joni'n credu bod Capsiwl Dyffryn Dryswch yn llawn trysor. Ond mae'r dihirod yn hefyd, ac yn benderfynol o'i ddwyn! Joni's convinced that the Dyffryn Dryswch Capsule is full of treasure!

programme.title: Kim a Cai a Cranc
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Kim a Cai ar antur hudolus a chwareus wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am gragen newydd i Cranc! Join Kim and Cai on a magical adventure as they search for a new shell for Cranc!

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Codi Pac
programme.desc: Geraint Hardy sy'n 'Codi Pac' ac yn ymlwybro o gwmpas Cymru. Y brifddinas, Caerdydd, sy'n serennu yr wythnos hon. Join Geraint Hardy as he discovers what Cardiff has to offer this time. [SL]

programme.title: Heno
programme.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

programme.title: Welsh Whisperer: Ni'n Teithio Nawr
programme.desc: Llangeitho sy'n cael sylw tro ma, a chaiff y Welsh Whisperer glywed hanes Daniel Rowland a thwf y Methodistiaid yng Nghymru. We're in Llangeitho, meeting local historian Dafydd Iolo Jones.

programme.title: Garddio a Mwy
programme.desc: Cyfres newydd. Mae Meinir a Sioned yng Ngorslas gyda Adam Jones, sy'n ymuno â thîm cyflwyno'r gyfres eleni. New series: Visiting the Kew Gardens Orchid Festival & native daffodils at Conwy.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Prynhawn Da
programme.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn gydag eitemau coginio a ffasiwn a chyngor am bopeth o addurno'ch cartref i ddewis llyfr da. Magazine series including features on fashion, style, antiques and cookery.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Y Cosmos
programme.desc: Heddiw byddwn yn gofyn oes 'na fywyd unrhyw le arall yn y cosmos ar wahân i'n planed ni? In this archive series we ask the age old question: 'Are we alone in the Universe?'

programme.title: Y Tralalas
programme.desc: Yng nghanol y goedwig, allwch chi glywed yr holl synau gwahanol? Ma Harmoni, Melodi a Bop eisiau gwybod pwy sy'n swnio fel ffliwt. Harmoni, Melodi and Bop wonder who makes a hooting sound.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Pan ma Crawc yn achosi ton enfawr i ddymchwel gwâl y dyfrgwn Pwti sy'n achub y dydd. Everyone's too busy to play with Toad so he foolishly opens the lockgate in order to propel his new boat.

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Heddiw mae Ben Dant yn ymuno á disgyblion Ysgol Y Graig, Merthyr Tudful i greu trysor penigamp. Ben Dant is on a new adventure to recycle and turn rubbish and waste into a masterpiece.

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Pan mae Lili Lafant a Cwstenin Cranc yn uno, mae Jet-fab am eu trechu. Dysga Jetboi mai gwendid nid mantais yw derbyn cymorth. Jet-boy learns that receiving help is indeed not a weakness.

programme.title: Kim a Cai a Cranc
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Kim a Cai ar antur hudolus sy'n llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth, wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am gragen newydd i Cranc! Join Kim and Cai as they search for a new shell for Cranc !

programme.title: Larfa
programme.desc: Mae'r criw dwl yn cael hwyl gyda blodau y tro hwn. The crazy crew have fun with flowers this time.

programme.title: Arthur a Chriw y Ford Gron
programme.desc: Mae Ygraine yn dod â memrwn i'r Brenin Uther - coeden deuluol sy'n profi bod y Tintagels yn perthyn i'r Pendreigiau - diddorol! It's time to test Arthur's legitimacy as heir to the throne!

programme.title: Itopia
programme.desc: Mae Lwsi yn mynd i chwilio am Zac ac yn sylweddoli bod Ems yn ei dilyn, ond mae hi'n penderfynu ei fod yn well i gael ei gwmni na pheidio. Alys hopes she can persuade Sara to help her.

programme.title: LEGO® DREAMZzz
programme.desc: Cyn wynebu Meistr yr Efail Rithiau a dod yn Gwsgarwyr swyddogol mae Mateo a'i ffrindiau yn cael cymorth gan Gwsgleidr hynod. Mateo and pals enlist the help of the mysterious Dream Bandit.

programme.title: Sain Ffagan
programme.desc: Wedi 6 mis o waith adnewyddu, mae'n bryd i'r sgaffald ddod lawr oddi ar Dwr y Cloc. Gardener Ceri is having fun cleaning the floorboards at Kennixton Farm by stamping herbs into them!

programme.title: Rownd a Rownd
programme.desc: Diwrnod anodd i Lowri a Philip, wrth iddynt wynebu apwyntiad ysbyty a phrofion tyngedfennol. A difficult day for Lowri and Philip, with their hospital appointment and critical tests.

programme.title: Pobol y Cwm
programme.desc: Mae Ffion am ddarganfod pwy wnaeth ymosod arni. Mae Colin a Lleucu'n gwneud tîm da, ond sylwa Lleucu ar ymddygiad od ei ffrind newydd. Ffion is determined to find out who attacked her.

programme.title: New: Y Sîn
programme.desc: Yn y bennod hon: hybu cerddoriaeth Cymru mewn sawl ffordd greadigol, cip ar brosiect ffotograffiaeth, a golwg ar waith cymunedol yn Wrecsam. This time: music, photography and community arts.

programme.title: Cynefin
programme.desc: Bydd Heledd, Iestyn a Ffion yn cyrraedd Bro Dysynni - ardal sy'n cuddio tu ôl i lethrau mynydd Cadair Idris rhwng Machynlleth a Dolgellau. We discover more about beautiful Bro Dysynni.

programme.title: The Death of Adolf Hitler
programme.desc: 1973. Drama. Directed by Rex Firkin. Stars Frank Finlay, Caroline Mortimer & Oscar Quitak. The story of the last ten days of Hitler's life as his dream of a thousand year Reich became a nightmare. [S]

programme.title: The Great Flamarion
programme.desc: 1945. Drama. Directed by Anthony Mann. Stars Erich von Stroheim, Mary Beth Hughes & Dan Duryea. A beautiful female performer manipulates all the men in her life in order to achieve her ambitions. [S]

programme.title: Beyond The Truth
programme.desc: The Lost Ark. The Search For The 'Lost Ark' - An insightful documentary searching for the resting place of The Lost Ark Of The Covenant containing exclusive interviews and footage. (S1, E01)

programme.title: Dangerous Assignment
programme.desc: The Havana Microfilm Story. 1952. Stars Brian Donlevy, Jeanne Tatum & Howard Joslin. Steve navigates the dangerous back alleys of Havana in search of a spy in possession of stolen documents. [S]

programme.title: Profile
programme.desc: 1954. Drama. Director Francis Searle and starring John Bentley, Kathleen Byron and Thea Gregory. The editor of a magazine is keen on the boss's daughter but her mother is keen on him. [S]

programme.title: Emergency
programme.desc: 1962. Drama directed by Francis Searle and starring Dermot Walsh. When a young girl is knocked down there are only three donors of the same blood group. A frantic search to find the donors begins. [S]

programme.title: The Traitor
programme.desc: 1957. Drama. Directed by Michael McCarthy. Stars Anton Diffring & Christopher Lee. Survivors of a WW2 resistance group meet at a country house to find out which of them had betrayed their leader. [S]

programme.title: The Narrowing Circle
programme.desc: 1955. Crime. Directed by Charles Saunders and starring Paul Carpenter and Hazel Court. A magazine crime writer is passed over for promotion by a rival who also steals the girl, but is murdered. [S]

programme.title: Hour of Decision
programme.desc: 1957. Crime. Stars Lionel Jeffries & Hazel Court. Reporter Joe (Jeff Morrow) finds his wife is the prime suspect in a murder investigation. [S]

programme.title: Burnt Evidence
programme.desc: 1954. Drama starring Jane Hylton, Duncan Lamont and Donald Gray. Lamont plays the jealous husband of Hylton. When confronting her lover, he accidentally shoots the man and runs for the hills. [S]

programme.title: A Case for PC 49
programme.desc: 1951. Mystery. Directed by Francis Searle. Stars Brian Reece, Joy Shelton & Christine Norden. PC 49 teams up with his girlfriend to solve a crime after a murder is committed right under his nose. [S]

programme.title: Three Crooked Men
programme.desc: 1959. Crime. Director: Ernest Morris. Stars Gordon Jackson, Sarah Lawson, Warren Mitchell. A shopkeeper is taken hostage when 3 crooks break into his shop to drill through to the bank next door. [S]

programme.title: The Edgar Wallace Mystery Theatre
programme.desc: The Shareout. 1961. Directed by Gerard Glaister. Stars Bernard Lee, Alexander Knox & William Russell. Mike Stafford helps Scotland Yard solve a case that has already caused three deaths. [S]

programme.title: Colonel March of Scotland Yard
programme.desc: The New Invisible Man. 1956. Stars Boris Karloff, Ewan Roberts . Colonel March receives a queer complaint that a pair of disembodied gloves killed a man. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The Cat and the Fiddle. 1966. Stars Adam West, Julie Newmar & Jack Kelly. Batman and Robin discover Catwoman is now masquerading as rich old Minerva Matthews and must stop her next scheme. [S]

programme.title: Dial 999
programme.desc: Death Ride. 1958. Stars Robert Beatty, Patrick Barr & Humphrey Heathcote. A man is suspected of murdering his wife; Maguire starts investigating, which motivates someone to try to run him over. [S]

programme.title: Rumpole of the Bailey
programme.desc: Rumpole and the Reform of Joby Jonson. Stars: Leo McKern, Marion Mathie, Patricia Hodge. Rumpole defends a juvenile delinquent on charges of assaulting an elderly woman.

programme.title: Love for Lydia
programme.desc: Episode 10. 1977. Stars Mel Martin, Christopher Blake & Peter Davison. Lydia and Tom are now deeply involved but conflict arises. Meanwhile, Richardson makes plans to move to London. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Join Caroline Munro for an evening of dark tales from the 70s. First up, we become trapped in the 1973 British anthology film The Vault of Horror directed by Roy Ward Baker. [S]

programme.title: The Vault of Horror
programme.desc: 1973. Horror. Directed by Roy Ward Baker. Stars Curd Jürgens, Terry-Thomas & Tom Baker. Five men trapped in the basement vault of an office building share visions with each other of their demise. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Don't go walking the streets alone at night! Caroline Munro follows up with the 1979 sci-fi horror The Dark, starring William Devane and Cathy Lee Crosby who team up to hunt down a savage killer. [S]

programme.title: The Dark
programme.desc: 1979. Sci-fi Horror. Directed by John 'Bud' Cardos & Tobe Hooper. Stars William Devane & Cathy Lee Crosby. An unlikely pair are drawn together when attempting to track down a vicious alien terror. [S]

programme.title: The Dark
programme.desc: 1979. Sci-fi Horror. Directed by John 'Bud' Cardos & Tobe Hooper. Stars William Devane & Cathy Lee Crosby. An unlikely pair are drawn together when attempting to track down a vicious alien terror. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Caroline Munro prepares to lock up for the night but not before giving us a sneaky peek at next week's horrifyingly terrific films. [S]

programme.title: Warp Speed
programme.desc: 1980. Sci-Fi. A beautiful psychic is dispatched to investigate a space shuttle when its crew mysteriously disappears. Starring Adam West and Camille Mitchell. [S]

programme.title: The Avenging Hand
programme.desc: 1936. Drama. Directed by Frank Richardson. Stars: Noah Beery, Louis Borel, Kathleen Kelly. An old match seller is murdered but it's left to an American gangster to find the killer. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life A Dog's Life
programme.desc: 1960. A film looking at London from a dog's point of view, from the family pet to the pampered pooch.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Home for Christmas. 1962. Stars Buddy Ebsen, Irene Ryan & Donna Douglas. Jed, Elly May, Jethro and Granny take their first airplane flight back home for Christmas to pay cousin Pearl a visit. [S]

programme.title: Amos Burke: Secret Agent
programme.desc: Terror in a Tiny Town: Part 2. A mad right-wing judge who wants to take over the country, airs subliminal radio messages to control the minds of the locals.

programme.title: The Gilded Cage
programme.desc: 1955. Directed by John Gilling and starring Alex Nicol. Two brothers are embroiled in a racket to smuggle a valuable painting. When a murder is committed they must try and clear their names. [S]

programme.title: Talking Pictures Meets Ray Dorset
programme.desc: At the TPTV Festival in Christchurch, Mike Read is joined by Ray Dorset - guitarist, singer, songwriter and founder of Mungo Jerry, for an exclusive interview and some tunes to sing along to. [S]

programme.title: You Pay Your Money
programme.desc: 1957. Crime Drama. A rogue smuggler enters a murky world when his wife is kidnapped. Directed by Maclean Rogers. Starring Hugh McDermott, Jane Hylton and Honor Blackman. [S]

programme.title: Model For Murder
programme.desc: 1959. Drama. Directed by Terry Bishop. Stars Keith Andes, Hazel Court, Michael Gough, Julia Arnall & Patricia Jessel. A Mayfair dress designer arranges for the theft of valuable jewellery. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life In Good Shape
programme.desc: 1962. A focus on modern design in Britain, with a look at some of the recent exhibits at the Design Centre.

programme.title: Landfall
programme.desc: 1949. War. Director: Ken Annakin. Stars Michael Denison, Patricia Plunkett & Kathleen Harrison. At Coastal Command in Southern England, an RAF pilot is suspended after sinking a British sub. [S]

programme.title: The Brothers
programme.desc: Loneliness. 1974. Stars Richard Easton, Hilary Tindall & Rio Fanning. Brian and Ann both face the problems of loneliness. Meanwhile, the Hammonds are invited to Sir Neville's for a shooting party. [S]

programme.title: The Capture
programme.desc: 1950. Western. Directed by John Sturges. Stars Lew Ayres & Teresa Wright. An oil worker kills a suspected robber, setting off a downward spiral of events when he discovers the man was innocent. [S]

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: The Gunfighter. 1959. Stars Rory Calhoun, Dick Kallman & John Pickard. When Bill stops a trail boss from harassing a saloon girl, the humiliated boss uses an eager young man to get his revenge. [S]

programme.title: Do You Know This Voice?
programme.desc: 1964. Drama. Directed by Frank Nesbitt. Stars Dan Duryea, Isa Miranda, Gwen Watford & Peter Madden. In this great murder mystery, the only clue to the killer's identity is his shoes! [S]

programme.title: Z-Cars
programme.desc: The Frighteners. 1976. Stars James Ellis, Douglas Fielding, Paul Stewart, Ronald Radd & Judy Matheson. An ex-villain is entitled to police protection like anyone else - isn't he? [S]

programme.title: Manhunt
programme.desc: Machine. 1970. Stars Alfred Lynch, Tony Beckley & Alethea Charlton. A Gestapo agent in the metalworks terrorises Jimmy into revealing his identity - and an innocent Polish worker is executed. [S]

programme.title: Maigret
programme.desc: Murder in a Vegetable Garden. 1999. Stars Bruno Cremer, Geneviève Fontanel & Michèle Simonnet. Maigret investigates the death of a homeless man, who was discovered at dawn in the shed of a garden. [S]

programme.title: Maigret
programme.desc: Peter the Lett. 1963. Stars Rupert Davies, Marius Goring & Peter Illing. An alarming piece of news makes its way to Maigret - one of the most dangerous criminals in Europe is now in Paris! [S]

programme.title: High Tide
programme.desc: 1980. Thriller. A man just released from prison for manslaughter heads to the West Country to solve the mystery behind his victim's cryptic last words. Stars Ian McShane, Wendy Morgan & John Bird. [S]

programme.title: Likely Lads: Whatever Happened?

programme.title: Benidorm

programme.title: Bread

programme.title: Up Pompeii!

programme.title: David Jason in A Bit of a Do

programme.title: Never the Twain
programme.desc: It's Oliver's birthday and Simon fixes him up with a birthday blind date, but it is with the man-eating Isadora Beecham from whose clutches Simon is trying to escape. S2 E2: As Young As You Feel

programme.title: Never the Twain
programme.desc: When Lyn gets a promotion, David feels inferior and forbids her to take it; they argue and she moves back in with Oliver, but Simon and Oliver collude to get them back together. S2 E3: A Woman's Place

programme.title: Shop: Atlas for Men

programme.title: Duty Free

programme.title: Wrecks That Changed The World

programme.title: Wrecks That Changed The World

programme.title: Dino Ranch

programme.desc: Dino-sitting: It's baby time in Cretacia! Suddenly Mazu, Tiny and Bill find themselves with little siblings, to go along with Rocky's baby cousin. And babies are a handful! (S2 Ep45)

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Party of One: Bill wants to have a small, quiet dinner party featuring his favorite fruit with his favorite three friends, but his besties don't listen to his wishes. (S2 Ep15)

programme.title: Dino Ranch

programme.title: Hello Kitty: Super Style!
programme.desc: Friendship Day - Artist Kitty: Everyone makes their best friend a Friendship Day gift, except Frido. Can Artist Kitty help Frido with her gift to Zonty? (S1 Ep10)

programme.title: Hello Kitty: Super Style!
programme.desc: A Bridge Between Beavers: When the Cherry Town bridge breaks, the Beaver triplets have trouble deciding how to fix it. They're going to need Construction Kitty's help! (S1 Ep11)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: The Ballad of Big Jon: Prompted by a western hero, Jon wants to prove he's a real epic hero as well, but learns it's the smaller, more everyday good deeds that really make him a hero. (S1 Ep21)

programme.title: Dino Ranch

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: A Lively Afternoon: While preparing for a fossil hunt in the mountains, a heavy downpour forces Billy, JC and Suzie to stay inside the ranch. (S1 Ep47)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Shower Power: When forest orderlies are powerless, dealing with a real epidemic is not an easy task. But Masha gets down to business, the main thing is perky laughter! (S6 Ep9)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Like Mother, Like daughter: Masha is playing mother and daughter with Rosie. But this time an honest lot distributed the roles. It's Masha's turn to put on her cap and get in the stroller. (S6 Ep11)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Blown Away: Masha finds someone's umbrella in the forest and decides to urgently return it. After a fun search, the owner of the umbrella is found, but why is he so dissatisfied? (S6 Ep12)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Who's Gifted?: Christmas is a time of miracles and gifts. All inhabitants prepared performances for Santa Claus, but Masha was the best prepared. Does the wizard have enough gifts for her? (S6 Ep13)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Smells Fishy: Robbery of the century! The ever-hungry Wolves managed to unhook a huge tank for transporting live fish from the train. But there was a strange passenger among the fish. (S6 Ep14)

programme.title: Bubble's Hotel
programme.desc: Fly Fly Away: When Bubble learns that her guest, Dash, has butterfly-phobia, she endeavours to help Dash overcome her fears. (S1 Ep21)

programme.title: Bubble's Hotel
programme.desc: A Delicate Problem: Bubble helps Lotus protect her precious, rare coral plant from a destructive seahorse. (S1 Ep22)

programme.title: Hello Kitty: Super Style!
programme.desc: Plushie Life: When Vastus loses his beloved plushie, Squidous the Muscular, he asks Detective Kitty for help tracking it down... without letting anyone know what they're looking for. (S1 Ep41)

programme.title: Hello Kitty: Super Style!
programme.desc: A Star is Built: Zonty is frustrated he didn't get cast as the prince in PI's play. He creates a robot version of himself to act in his place. But his plan backfires. (S1 Ep42)

programme.title: Hello Kitty: Super Style!
programme.desc: Battle of the Bands: Kitty, Frido, Zonty, Pinky, and Rio form a band, but their bickering causes them to split. Pop Star Kitty must reunite them in time for their first concert. (S1 Ep43)

programme.title: Hello Kitty: Super Style!
programme.desc: Three's a Crowd: Zing and Kitty team up with Rio in a competition, but Zing is afraid he'll make them lose. Athlete Kitty helps Zing understand Rio has his own skills to bring to the team. (S1 Ep44)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: Christmas At The Ranch: It's Christmas Eve! While taking the bunnies home, Billy, Suzie, and Jean-Claude come across Santa Claus, who has just had a sleigh accident. (S1 Ep41)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster

programme.desc: Tough Cookie, The Big Brother: To help Billy and Suzie harvest the extremely rare flowers that Grandma Hyda needs, JC leaves his little brother, Didier, in Dede's care. (S1 Ep43)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster

programme.desc: Fast And Furrryous: Bear has made a new purchase: he's bought a motorcycle! Now as a cool biker, he plans on impressing She-Bear, but she doesn't seem to like it very much. (S5 Ep25)

programme.desc: Tyrannosaurus Wrecks: The Jr Ranchers face a challenge when trying to get a feisty pair of baby T-Rex's to listen and learn how to be Dino Ranch dinos. (S2 Ep38)

programme.desc: Sleepover: Cory has his very first sleepover at Kimmy and Timmy O'Tool's and discovers how different things can be at someone else's house. (S1 Ep6)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Speed Limits: Things get out of hand on the playground when Cory takes over as School Safety Monitor. (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Copy Car: Cory has had it up to his windshield wipers when Chrissy won't stop copying everything he says and does! (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Heroes of the Road Part I: The Pjs can't wait to use their PJ vehicles against Carluccio and Carleena. But as a result, they don't work well with Newton or the PJ Riders. (S5 Ep49)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Heroes of the Road Part II: The PJs can't wait to use their PJ vehicles against Carluccio and Carleena. But as a result, they don't work well with Newton or the PJ Riders. (S5 Ep50)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: Sargent Cactus's Hat: Suzie and Billy are laughing at a story they are reading in a comic about an ant, a cavalry sergeant, who disappears under her hat, which is too big for her. (S1 Ep19)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: Miss Goatie's Funny Whistles: Miss Goatie has lent Billy and Jean-Claude a little case full of decoys with which they can attract lots of animals. Billy wants to try calling a bird of prey. (S1 Ep20)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: The Kite Battle: Billy and JC are dreaming of having a kite they've seen in the window of the general store. But Tough Cookie buys the very last one - right before their eyes. (S1 Ep21)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: Under the Stars: Billy, JC and Suzie are very excited; tonight, they are going to camp by the ranch! To round off the evening, Scott tells them a scary story about the Sasquatch. (S1 Ep22)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: The Spookasaurus: Jon gets spooked by a campfire story about a legendary dinosaur but doesn't want to admit it to Miguel and Min. He learns that his family is there for him. (S1 Ep4)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Jane's Perfect Present: After the Jr Ranchers spend all their time trying to prepare a special surprise birthday gift for Jane, they find out what she wanted was to spend the day with them. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Pterodactyl-Doodle-Doo: Miguel and the Jr Ranchers learn that taking other people's feelings into consideration is the most important part of any good deed. (S1 Ep6)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: The Long Way Home: Jon learns that shortcuts aren't always shorter when the Ranchers get lost in the badlands with the hungry Thunderfoot on their trail. (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Trade in the Shade: When an uncooperative brontosaurus gets between the Jr Ranchers and their goal to harvest the apples from the orchard, the gang discovers the importance of others' needs. (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Trading Day: When the Jr Ranchers switch up their dino-rides, they have a hard time getting used to each other's dinosaurs. (S1 Ep39)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: It's a Dino Egg-Mergency: When a batch of eggs need to be moved from the Hatchery and start hatching, Min spirals into a frenzy trying to wrangle the newborns and keep them safe. (S1 Ep40)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: The Dilo Difference: Jon wants to help a Dilophosaurus fit in on the Ranch, but he runs into problems when the other dinosaurs are startled by the excitable little dino's appearance. (S2 Ep39)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: The Odd Partners: When headstrong Blitz and stubborn Clara Tinhorn get lost in the Hidden Forest, the two must work together to escape while avoiding an angry T-Rex looking for her baby. (S2 Ep40)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Wish Upon A Star: Wow, it's another New Year! Masha has a lot of experience in organising unforgettable celebrations, so she takes matters into her own hands. (S5 Ep16)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: 20,000 Scraps Under The Sea: Molang and Piu Piu are on their small boat when they see a wrecked ship from afar. The captain swears a monster attacked him! (S5 Ep31)
